title: CAM within a field force of countervailing powers: The case
author: Almeida; Joana; Gabe; Jonathan
description: This paper examines the extent to which the position of the medical profession and the state towards complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) practitioners has changed since the late 1990s, taking
